pull.title: scripted-diff: Rename key size consts to be relative to their class
pull.body: ~~And introduce CPubKeySig to host code relative to key sigs.~~

events.body:
Concept ACK.
Not sure if `CPubKeySig` needs its own space.
On second thought, dropped PubKeySig - without any other code it's barely a separate concern.

rename.from: Refactor key / signature size consts to be relative to their relevant class
rename.to: Refactor key size consts to be relative to their relevant class

events.body:
seemingly unrelated travis error:
>File "/home/travis/build/bitcoin/bitcoin/build/bitcoin-i686-pc-linux-gnu/test/functional/rpc_net.py", line 54, in _test_getnettotals
>    assert_equal(before['bytesrecv_per_msg']['pong'] + 32, after['bytesrecv_per_msg']['pong'])

kicked travis
@instagibbs thanks - seems like that is a timing-related failure, I pushed #12545 to increase the wait, and reduce the likelihood of spurious failures.

rename.from: Refactor key size consts to be relative to their relevant class
rename.to: scripted-diff: Rename key size consts to be relative to their class

events.body: Rebased to confirm scripted-diff still applies. It does.
utACK 2dda5dd034, but please note that the scripted diff will modify files outside the git tree. I'd prefer to avoid that.
Updated to include 2 new cases, and brought it down to a single `sed` call which only acts on files in the repo.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#16463](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16463.html) ([BIP 174] Implement serialization support for GLOBAL_XPUB field. by achow101)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
Rebased, added a commit to fixup whitespace.

tree 40bfd19c015a4e23c39d0ecc4af56f1101735288
parent 2d46f1be0c3c8b7287aa1f62bb1f5b4a8d00ff6e
author Ben Woosley <ben.woosley@gmail.com> 1523565004 -0700
committer Ben Woosley <ben.woosley@gmail.com> 1551691829 -0800

scripted-diff: Rename CPubKey and CKey::*_KEY_SIZE and COMPRESSED_*_KEY_SIZE

To SIZE and COMPRESSED_SIZE

-BEGIN VERIFY SCRIPT-
sed -i 's/PRIVATE_KEY_SIZE/SIZE/g' src/*.h src/*.cpp src/**/*.h src/**/*.cpp
sed -i 's/COMPRESSED_PRIVATE_KEY_SIZE/COMPRESSED_SIZE/g' src/*.h src/**/*.cpp src/**/*.h src/**/*.cpp
sed -i 's/PUBLIC_KEY_SIZE/SIZE/g' src/*.h src/*.cpp src/**/*.h src/**/*.cpp
sed -i 's/COMPRESSED_PUBLIC_KEY_SIZE/COMPRESSED_SIZE/g' src/*.h src/*.cpp src/**/*.h src/**/*.cpp
-END VERIFY SCRIPT-

events.message:
scripted-diff: Rename CPubKey and CKey::*_KEY_SIZE and COMPRESSED_*_KEY_SIZE

To SIZE and COMPRESSED_SIZE

-BEGIN VERIFY SCRIPT-
sed -i 's/PRIVATE_KEY_SIZE/SIZE/g' src/*.h src/*.cpp src/**/*.h src/**/*.cpp
sed -i 's/COMPRESSED_PRIVATE_KEY_SIZE/COMPRESSED_SIZE/g' src/*.h src/**/*.cpp src/**/*.h src/**/*.cpp
sed -i 's/PUBLIC_KEY_SIZE/SIZE/g' src/*.h src/*.cpp src/**/*.h src/**/*.cpp
sed -i 's/COMPRESSED_PUBLIC_KEY_SIZE/COMPRESSED_SIZE/g' src/*.h src/*.cpp src/**/*.h src/**/*.cpp
-END VERIFY SCRIPT-
